Question Text: Baseline blood sample collected - derived from BioSpm_Setting_v1r0,  BioSpm_Visit_v1r0 and BioCol_TubeCollected_v1r0
Notes: If  BioCol_TubeCollected_v1r0 for any tube is 1 except tubes  BioCol_0006_v1r0 and BioCol_0007v1r0 and BioSpm_Visit_v1r0 is 0 then BioFin_BaseBloodCol_v1r0 is 1
